Frequent outings.Tech stack is good in all teams. 3. People are supportive in most of the teams. 4. Hr team is good, they take good care of their employees. 5. Good Hikes , around 25-30% every year.

The off campus placement process was quite nice. And the interviewers were very friendly. They never expect you to know everything but you should definitely be having knowledge of data structures and algorithms with problem solving skills. They will also help you out during the interview and will judge you on your overall skills.
